Events.PreEventString: You hear a crunching sound while stepping on the snow. You find a $1 buried inside.
Events.PostEventString: It's not broken. You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: You find yourself alone in the mountains with a threatening $1.
Events.PostEventString: The Pokemon leaves you alone, dropping $1 behind.

Events.PreEventString: There's a purple shining crystal buried in the snow. It's refracted glow looks quite mystical. It whispers: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
You arrive to an operational chair-lift. The operator shares a first-aid kit with you.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: You arrive to an operational chair-lift. The operator shares a first-aid kit with you.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from their status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A $1 rolls down from the mountains and bumps into you. It's disoriented.
Events.PostEventString: You decided to take care of it for a while.

Events.PreEventString: Before you could react, the snow below starts shaking! You get caught in a mini avalanche.
Events.PostEventString: You are ok, but your Pokemon have sustained a bit of damage.

Events.PreEventString: Your pokemon are carefully walking on an icy area.
Events.PostEventString: Suddenly, the ice breaks and $1 falls into a puddle of freezing water. It got frostbite.

Events.PreEventString: $1 is sitting on a bench, wearing some winter clothes. 'What do you say to a battle?' They then heal your pokemon to full health.
Events.PostEventString: $1 is satisfied with the battle, you continue onwards.

Events.PreEventString: The Pokemon research society is having a skiing trip. They wave when they see you.
Events.PostEventString: After spending a bit of time with them, they hand you a $1.

Events.PreEventString: Team Paradox is having a skiing trip. They wave when they see you.
Events.PostEventString: After spending a bit of time with them, they hand you a $1.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see a chair-lift system that is currently turned off. If you give it a shock, it may start up.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 starts the machine back again, allowing you to descend to the next part of the mountain.

Floors.ShortcutClue: The next slope is not so steep, so you may be able to slide down with the right move...
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 lets you slide down to the bottom of the mountain!

Floors.ShortcutClue: You have reached the base of the mountain, but the area is strangely deserted. Better investigate around for a while.

BossEvent.PreEventString: In a desolate clearing in the mountain base, you see a slumbering titan made of ice. As you approach, the floor starts rumbling...
BossEvent.PostEventString: As you defeat the titan, the ground rumbles again. Your actions here have are changing the world.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: You find a small cabin in the mountains. There's enough space inside for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...

PostBossEvent.PreEventString: ... then the balance of power will change forever in the world.
PostBossEvent.PostEventString: The mythical beasts of creation will roam the lands once again.
